mapper.select: select * from score sc, student st where sc.student_id=st.id and sc.course_id=#{courseId} and st.class_id=#{classId} order by sc.rank_in_class
select * from score sc, student st where sc.student_id=st.id and sc.course_id=#{courseId} and st.class_id=#{classId} and sc.score_number=#{scoreNumber} order by sc.rank_in_class
select * from score sc,student st,class c where sc.student_id=st.id and st.class_id=c.id and c.grade=#{grade} and sc.course_id=#{courseId} and sc.score_number=#{scoreNumber} order by sc.rank_in_grade
select * from score where course_id=#{courseId} and student_id=#{studentId}
mapper.update: update score set score_number=#{scoreNumber} ,rank_in_class = #{rankInClass} , rank_in_grade=#{rankInGrade} where course_id=#{courseId} and student_id=#{studentId}
mapper.select: select sc.score_number,(@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) from score sc, student st, (Select (@rowNum :=0) ) b where sc.student_id=st.id and sc.course_id=#{courseId} and st.class_id=#{classId} group by sc.score_number order by sc.score_number DESC

select sc.course_id, c.grade, sc.score_number from score sc,student st,class c where sc.course_id=#{courseId} and sc.student_id = st.id and st.class_id = c.id and c.grade=#{grade} group by sc.score_number order by sc.score_number DESC
